one_reviews_text:
Hello

Nice game but,

The proposed colors are sad.

The timer annoys me, I don't play to be the best but to relax. I don't like the impossibility of playing quietly without any notion of time.

An addicting new take on my favorite puzzle game series! I love how responsive the blocks are when placing. Along with the sfx and the music, it's all very satisfying. 
I would love to see more palletes and more game modes in the future, maybe a 1v1 mode? 
I can see myself playing this for a long time to come to get that #1 spot!
review_feedback:
Thank you very much for your review! I am so happy that you enjoy the game! :)

Actually I plan to add more palettes soon. I will create a poll on my Discord channel (here is the link if you'd like to join "https://discord.gg/VtzJPaA") and the community will choose the new palette.
I would also like to add the multiplayer at some point in the future so stay tuned!

Thank you for purchasing my game!

review_title: A wonderful game. My wife could not stop
one_reviews_text:
Extremely cool game, welcome back Tetris like game. Excellent for kids as  well to practice geospatial game. 

I recommend. Could not stop playing.

Cédric
review_feedback: Thank you so much for your review! I am glad you're having a blast! :)

one_reviews_text: This I would reccomend to people if they are looking for a good simple VR game,v especially if they like puzzle games.
review_feedback: Thank you very much for your review!
Thanks a lot for your review!
